__e: If there isn't anything else, y'all don't mind if I leave, do you?
In that case, I'm sure you won't mind... that I remind you that I'm a married man... and that I have a son.
If you're so sure that I don't have a case, then you shouldn't care if I leave with this box.
So Lois isn't gonna mind if I call you every once in a while, right?
Something happened in Brooklyn last week... a rape.
Won't it be unbearable for your mother in the country?
I'm sure neither of you'll mind whether I'm here or not.
Forty-s... forty-three. That is, in five years I'll be 43. Seems like only yesterday I was partying with the best of them.
Bigger than prom, bigger than high school, and it won't matter if you were the prom queen or the quarterback of the football team or... the biggest nerd in school.
